entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Qu'Appelle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 01:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:04 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:04 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:04 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
